channel.title: Need help with devolution lv 100+ glitch
channel.description: hi when people gets lvl 100+ in a skill and log out it says they are level 99/their real lvl in that skill how do i change it so it says real lvl/real lvl

item.title: Need help with devolution lv 100+ glitch
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

how can i make it so it says up to 137/137?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 19, 2008, 02:15:54 AM[/size][hr]in wat file?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with devolution lv 100+ glitch

item.title: Need help with devolution lv 100+ glitch
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“manmanner, post:3, topic:199063”]does that mean that if a player is lvl 137 in a skill
when they log in they are lvl 137/137 in that skill?[/quote]No it means that, according to what you said, people that log in with level 100 in a skill have 99/100. What the code there will do is make the skills 100/100.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with devolution lv 100+ glitch

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

You don’t, unless you wanna like make it so when they log in it’s playerLevel[0] += 1; and do that to all the skills.
